title: Morningstars
content:
ad carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Morningstars in BG3. These Weapon Actions are Heartstopper and Concussive Smash.

Battleaxes Clubs Daggers Darts Flails Glaives Greataxes Greatclubs Greatswords Halberds Handaxes Hand Crossbows Heavy Crossbows Javelins Light Crossbows Light Hammers Longbows Longswords Maces Mauls Morningstars Pikes Quarterstaves Rapiers Scimitars Shortbows Shortswords Sickles Spears Tridents War Picks W
